sentences.en: Diplomats can be a notoriously unreliable and misleading source of information.
sentences.cn: 外交官可能会提供一些靠不住的误导性信息，这是众所周知的。

sentences.en: Don'tbelieve what you are told; double-check with an independent source.
sentences.cn: 别相信别人告诉你的话，用独立的信息来源再核实一遍。

sentences.en: Dreams can be a rich source of inspiration for an artist.
sentences.cn: 梦境可以成为艺术家灵感的丰富源泉。

sentences.en: Fish is a rich source of protein.
I've heard from a reliable source that company is running very badly.
sentences.cn: 我已从一位可靠人士那儿获悉,这家公司经营得非常糟糕.
不愿透露姓名的人提供的消息

sentences.en: List all your sources at the end of your essay.
sentences.cn: 在论文末尾列出你所有资料的出处。

sentences.en: Milk products are an excellent source of calcium and protein.
sentences.cn: 奶制品富含钙与蛋白质。

sentences.en: Plants are the ultimate source of all foodstuffs.
sentences.cn: 植物是所有食物的最根本来源。

sentences.en: Supporters say open source software is more secure.
sentences.cn: 拥护者认为开放源代码软件安全性更高。

sentences.en: Taking ingredients from the same source means the beers stay the same.
sentences.cn: 取材自同一原材料意味着啤酒的口味始终如一。

sentences.en: The cash comes from an unnamed source.
The long drought dried up the source.
sentences.cn: 长时间干旱， 水源都枯竭了。

sentences.en: They get their money from various sources.
sentences.cn: 他们从各种途径弄到钱。

sentences.en: We both looked up to determine the source of the water.
sentences.cn: 我们俩都向上看,以便确定水从何处流下来.

sentences.en: We're interested in the source of these fictitious rumours.
sentences.cn: 我们对这些子虚乌有的谣言从何而来很感兴趣。

trans.tran_cn: 根源，本源，源头，水源，原因，提供消息的人
trans.tran_en: a thing, place, activity etc that you get something from

trans.tran_cn: 原料来源，起源，寻求来源，寻求生产商（或提供商）
（从…）获得，发起，向…提供消息，寻求（尤指供货）的来源
